title: Enhancing, localising and democratising tax-benefit policy analysis
description: Supporting the development of expanded program coverage and geographic detail in PolicyEngine UK, as well as a redesigned interface.

title: Labor supply responses
description: Supporting the development of labor supply responses in PolicyEngine US.

title: SALT and AMT policy calculator
description: Supporting the development of specialized policy calculators for State and Local Tax (SALT) deductions and Alternative Minimum Tax (AMT) policies.

title: State & congressional district policy breakdowns
description: Supporting the development of detailed policy impact analysis at the state and congressional district levels.

title: MyFriendBen
description: Supporting the development and maintenance of the PolicyEngine rules engine and API, powering state and federal programs in MyFriendBen.
